revision.comment: /* top */ clean up, replaced: hynix → SK hynix, SK SK hynix → SK hynix

|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Android;;;

|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = TechNexion |manuf_model = PICO-IMX6UL |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 02/2016 |estprice = 69 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B08944H8ZG |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B0894L686H |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AMPAK AP6212 |rad1modif = SDIO (module) |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43430; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ''PICO-HOBBIT'' and ''REV: A1'' are silkscreened on the carrier board. :An earlier version of this board was referred to as ''HobbitBoard''.
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Freescale (NXP)]]'' i.MX6UL (MCIMX6G2D) :@528MHz Single Core [[ARM]] (Cortex-A7) *Memory: 2x 512MB SDRAM (DDR3L) *Onboard Storage: 4GB (eMMC) *Wi-Fi: 802.11bgn 1T1R *Network: 1x FE (100M) *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *Power Source: 5V/1A
==Links of Interest== *[http://linuxgizmos.com/wandboard-org-spins-brillo-on-imx6ul-iot-hacker-board/ ''Wandboard.org spins Brilo-on-iMX6UL IoT Hacker Board'' on '''LinuxGizmos'''] *[https://www.nxp.com/docs/en/user-guide/PICO-IMX6UL-USG.pdf ''PICO-IMX6ULHARDWARE MANUAL'' on '''NXP.com''' ] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2016/02/09/wandboard-introduces-69-hobbitboard-made-for-brillo-powered-by-nxp-i-mx6-ultralite-processor/ ''Wandboard Introduces $69 Hobbitboard Made for Brillo Powered by NXP i.MX6 UltraLite Processor'' on '''CNXSOFT''' ]
==See also== :;[[Wandboard]] *[[Wandboard PICO-IMX6UL-KIT]] *[[Wandboard PICO-PI-IMX7]] *[[Wandboard Quad]]
